design_system.name: Institutional Neutral
design_system.description: A clean, high-density, neutral gray design system optimized for internal government/health dashboards. Prioritizes readability, data density, and professional restraint.

file_structure_rules.components: Use named exports: export const ComponentName = ...
file_structure_rules.pages: Use default exports: export default function PageName() ...

universal_rules: Ensure all interactive elements have a 'data-testid' attribute.
Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds; stick to solid neutral colors.
Use 'Public Sans' for headings and 'IBM Plex Sans' for body text.
Tables should be dense and information-rich.
Authentication pages should be clean, centered, with a professional background image.
